author: tom
description:
Installing Python via MacPorts on Mac.The following page has instructions for setting up a Python distribution for Astronomy using the MacPorts package manager on Mac:http://astrofrog.github.com/macports-python/MacPorts has several advantages over other installation methods, including:
No Licensing issues
Dependencies are taken care of automatically
Easy to update packages 
Installs complex packages including numpy/scipy/matplotlib/pyqt4/pygtk 
Easy to install several versions of Python (great for experimenting with Python 3)   

The only downside is the initial installation time for some of the complex packages, as these are installed from source (best to start the initial installation of packages overnight). Feedback is welcome!
title: Installing Python via MacPorts on Mac
